name: BuildJet
headline: High-performance computing cloud
description:
BuildJet makes CI faster by running its own cloud on top of Gaming CPUs

Today, BuildJet offers a CI product that makes GitHub Actions 2x faster and cheaper, by plugging in BuildJet's Gaming CPU Cloud into GitHub Actions. Simply change 1 line, and enjoy the speed-up.

founders.name: Adam Shiervani, Founder
founders.description: Adam Shiervani is a co-founder of BuildJet, with over a decade of experience working in startups, Adam began as a frontend developer and progressed over the years to become the Chief Product Officer at Germany's largest market research company, Civey. At Civey, Adam, together with Lian, who served as CTO, scaled the company and discovered the significant impact that consumer CPUs have on CI speed.

founders.name: Lian Duan, Founder
founders.description: Lian Duan, co-founder of BuildJet, holds a master’s degree in bioinformatics from ETH and began his career working as a Senior Full-stack developer at a German data privacy startup alongside Adam Shiervani. Lian later moved to become the CTO of Germany’s largest market research company, Civey, where he worked closely with Adam to scale the company and gain insight into the significant impact of gaming CPUs on CI speed.

# Make GitHub Actions Faster
## Managed performance runners for Github Actions. Change 1 line, get 2x faster and cheaper builds.
[Get Started for free](https://buildjet.com/<https:/app.buildjet.com/onboarding>)[Read the docs](https://buildjet.com/</for-github-actions/docs>)
Free trial minutes · No CC required
![Diff between before and after installing BuildJet for GitHub Actions](https://buildjet.com/for-github-actions-diff-illustration.svg)
![YC](https://buildjet.com/yc_logo.svg)
BuildJet is trusted by companies all over the world

## Keep GitHub Actions, just not their runners
BuildJet for GitHub Actions gives you access to a secure and fast runner fleet. Simply change 1 line in your configuration file and you're ready to be more productive
### Incredibly easy to set up
Installing BuildJet for GitHub Actions can't be easier. You simply sign in with your GitHub Account and authorize BuildJet to access your organisation. Now you can add BuildJet for GitHub Actions where ever you see the runs-on property.
![](https://buildjet.com/long-code-example.png)
### Your security, our priority
We believe people who use our service expect us to store their data securely, respect their business secrets and have their data security a primary priority. We pledge to keep your code secret and not accessed by anyone, including us.
[Read more ](https://buildjet.com/</for-github-actions/docs/about/security>)
![](https://buildjet.com/server-icon.svg)
Isolated VM
![](https://buildjet.com/shred-icon.svg)
Complete wipe after every job
![](https://buildjet.com/key-icon.svg)
Heavily audited access
## You're in good company
BuildJet for GitHub Actions gives you access to a secure and fast runner fleet. Simply change 1 line in your configuration file and you're ready to be more productive
BuildJet made my Github Actions run so much faster. After a simple installation, we went went from 40 min to 10 min. Very happy and satisfied with the service.
![Avatar of Rema Rocca](https://buildjet.com/ema-avatar.jpg)
Rema RoccaLead SRE @ TillyPay
Not only did BuildJet cut our costs in half, but it also cut our GitHub Actions build time with about 50%. Great idea and great execution!
![Avatar of Nathan Humphreys](https://buildjet.com/nathan-avatar.jpg)
Nathan HumphreysCTO @ Shrunken Jumper Software Ltd.
Our developers complained about GitHub Actions being slow. We went looking for how to speed up GA and found BuildJet. Let's just say they don't complain anymore!
![Avatar of Julia Wallin](https://buildjet.com/julia-avatar.jpg)
Julia WallinCTO @ Amöba AB
Love the speed and absolutely love being able to select different hardware for different tasks. Some of my jobs can use more cores, some can’t.
![Avatar of Jack Mahoney](https://buildjet.com/jack-avatar.jpg)
Jack MahoneyCTO @ Mailslurp

generated_description:
**BuildJet: Accelerating CI with Gaming Power**

Founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W23, BuildJet is based in Berlin, Germany. Its mission revolves around enhancing high-performance computing in the cloud, specifically aimed at making Continuous Integration (CI) significantly faster and affordable.

Originally conceived to leverage gaming CPUs, BuildJet amplifies the speed and cost-efficiency of GitHub Actions by a staggering 2x. This is achieved simply by swapping out a single line in your config—you plug in BuildJet's Gaming CPU Cloud, and voilà, you’re faster and your build costs are lower.

### What They Offer
With a team of just two people, BuildJet has designed a cloud-native CI product that seamlessly integrates with GitHub Actions. Users report impressive speed-ups, with indications that even the heaviest workflows can get completed in half the time.

- **Speed:** Double the performance as compared to standard GitHub Actions.
- **Cost-Efficiency:** Lower per minute pricing compared to traditional CI options, reducing overall build costs.
- **Security First:** BuildJet emphasizes data safety, ensuring that user code is kept confidential and secure.

### Target Audience
BuildJet primarily caters to developers and teams using GitHub Actions, providing a more performant alternative to the default runners offered by GitHub. The platform is tagged under developer-tools, SaaS, B2B, and infrastructure, clearly showcasing its focus on tech-savvy users.

### Customer Validation
BuildJet already commands trust with notable users like Netflix, NASA, and various open-source projects, all of whom have experienced considerable gains in both speed and efficiency since adopting its service. Happy clients rave about drastic reductions in build times and costs—one team reported going from a 40-minute process down to just 10!

### Explore Further
If you’re looking to supercharge your CI processes without the burden of hefty costs, BuildJet is worth a try. You can get started for free, and with no credit card required, it’s as easy as changing a line in your configuration.

Visit [BuildJet's Website](https://buildjet.com) to learn more about their offerings, pricing, and customer stories. 

In the world of development, speed matters. BuildJet is here to make CI build times a thing of the past, letting teams focus on what truly matters—building great products.
